name: df-cnfn
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4
body: |- wceq(ccnfn, crab(s0, co(cc, cmap, chba), wral(s1, chba, wral(s2, crp, wrex(s3, crp, wral(s4, chba, wi(wbr(cfv(cno, co(cv(s4), cmv, cv(s1))), clt, cv(s3)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cv(s0), cv(s4)), cmin, cfv(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), clt, cv(s2)))))))))
comment: Define the set of continuous functionals on Hilbert space. For every "epsilon" ( ` y ` ) there is a "delta" ( ` z ` ) such that... (Contributed by NM, 11-Feb-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
